itunes:title: #36 - Don't be a Lazy Entrepreneur with Tommy Walker of Shopify
title: #36 - Don't be a Lazy Entrepreneur with Tommy Walker of Shopify
description:
Today Tommy Walker of Shopify's Enterprise Ecommerce blog is joining us to talk about procrastination, feeling overwhelmed or scared, and how not to be a lazy entrepreneur without burning out by raising the bar, meeting your deadlines, not getting too precious about the work, and the importance of mentors.

—

Listen to more Being Boss shows on our website, on Apple Podcasts, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

Follow Being Boss on Instagram: @beingbossclub

Join the Being Boss Community: beingboss.club/community
